Title: Dark Shadows
Writer: Seth Grahame-Smith (screenplay), John August (story), Seth Grahame-Smith (story), Dan Curtis (television series)
Actors: Johnny Depp, Michelle Pfeiffer, Helena Bonham Carter, Eva Green
Plot: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.
